description:
Several years after Yuuji Kazami and his friends fought for their lives in a fierce battle, a new generation of heroines gather at Mihama Academy, which has been reinstated as a 'specialist training school'. 
Taking place in the same world as The Fruit of Grisaia, new characters bring an exciting fresh take in Volume 7 of this brand new series!
Before the conclusion of the series in the next episode, every motive and story will intertwine!

Available in three languages!
The text can be set to Japanese, English or Simplified Chinese (audio is Japanese only). This includes in-game text, options, and the digital manual. Language settings can be changed at any time.

Play using only the touch screen! Play with one hand!
Play in handheld mode with the Joy-Con™ controllers attached, or detach them and play with just the touch controls! While in tabletop mode or TV mode, everything can be controlled using only the Joy-Con™ (R), allowing you to play with only one hand!
Also available for the Nintendo Switch™ Lite system. (A separate Joy-Con™ (R) is required to play with one hand.)

Volume 7 Summary
As daily life goes unchanged, the girls continue to sharpen their fangs in silence for the inevitable showdown. 
Meanwhile, Shiori Arisaka finds herself in two minds. Should she allow her students to jump headfirst into this battle, or should she forbid it? Their fate lies entirely in her hands.
Harrowingly, at the core of the enemy forces are former Phantom Trigger members; Enishi and Kuroe. The climactic final confrontation is close at hand.

Gameplay
This game is a visual novel, where where you can read it like a book or watch it like an anime or a movie.
The story comes to life with a star-studded voice actor cast and fully-voiced story (excluding the main character), gorgeous graphics and music, and immersive animation.
